text: TV Mall (PTY) LTD is a South African multinational shopping and infomercial tv channel that showcases health, beauty, fitness, home appliances, fashion, furniture, technology and home products. TV Mall provides shipping for countries overseas and other neighbouring African countries. ==History== TV Mall (PTY) LTD was launched by DSTV on 1 June 2018 to be a 24-hour all days channel to showcase super products that would improve the lives of viewers. The products advertised show life hacks on newly invented products. As of April 30, 2020 the channel will now be available as an online service. ==Shopping== As the show airs daily viewers are given a chance to purchase the goods online with shipping online. Hosts are hired by the channel to performe fitness drills and showcase new products. Jobs for hosting the brands are always available online as the network sets to give everyone a chance to work for TV Mall. People are provided a chance to select their products and purchase them either by telephone or by using EFF. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Satellite television Category:Television in South Africa Category:2018 establishments in South Africa Category:Mass media in Johannesburg Category:Mass media companies established in 2018
